The NPS DRR Template is an R Template and accompanying documentation to facilitate generating Data Release Reports associated with NPS packages for publication to DataStore.

To report bugs or request enhancements, please use post an  [issue](https://github.com/nationalparkservice/DRR_Template/issues) on github or email [Rob Baker](mailto:robert_baker@nps.gov%20?subject="DRR_Template")
